lines.text: You don't die for women. You kill for them.
This came in about six o'clock. Twenty two escaped. They've captured or killed fifteen so that leaves seven.
that must be Cesar Menendez. Real handsome lookin' man - cut the head off a little gal in Nogales one time. Said he wanted her earrings.
And Zach Provo.
I though he was dead.
Well, don't worry about it, Sam. We'll get him. Yeah, we got automobiles, telegraph, the railroad. I ain't ever heard of anyone out run a telephone yet.
[Provo sees the posse in hot pursuit]
Having second thoughts?
A man who has second thoughts ain't no man.
When lead starts slappin' these rocks up here, do you figure we're all going to hide behind that juicy little butt of hers?
You can go back if you have to. I'll go where I have to.
Yeah, well, I know where you're going. You're going about six feet under, that's where you're going, because they got seven guns to your one.
Everybody's got to die. Nobody's got to give up!
Are you in or out?
Man, for four thousand in gold, I'd cut my old man in a town square and let the vultures feed on his carcass!
The things I think up here, I think maybe two to three minutes ahead of you. And that's what counts.
I'm not dead; I'm retired.
a good horse and a silver dollar.
Get up. Get up, God dammit; I don't say it twice!
That's mighty white of you!
